channel.title: HELP please?
channel.description:
i was thinking about it and decided, who is more helpful then the people at moparscape!(lmao)
im currently learning java and in the ebook im using it says i need a file named World.java
when i type :
System.out.println(new World());
it's supposed to say 'A 640 by 480 world with 0 turtles in it.' and a screen is supposed to come up and is supposed to look like this:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img363.imageshack.us/img363/3325/aagklge0cm5.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=363&i=aagklge0cm5.jpg][IMG]http://img363.imageshack.us/img363/3325/aagklge0cm5.a27d13f896.jpg[/img][/URL]
does anyone have the World.java or .class and if you do could you please upload it/send it to me on msn. or if anyone could just give me the code to make a window like that it would be extremely helpful.

item.title: HELP please?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“darkatdawn, post:6, topic:226026”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=296948.msg2387033#msg2387033 date=1218818505]
What the hell has reading an e-book about making a GUI got to do with the World class from a RSC server?
[/quote]

i skipped it and started reading a different book, but i never said anything about it being for an rsc server.[/quote]

Then why would you post this in RSC Dev…i mean comon now.

Read full topic
